name: anycable
description: AnyCable is a scalable WebSocket server that replaces ActionCable for Ruby on Rails apps. It decouples the PubSub layer, works with gRPC, supports multiple languages and drastically improves real-time performance.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: High-performance WebSocket server for Rails applications. Handle thousands of connections

features.title: Actioncable Replacement
features.description: Drop-in replacement with dramatically improved performance. Upgrade seamlessly

features.title: Grpc Support
features.description: Decoupled architecture using gRPC for language flexibility. Not limited to Ruby

features.title: Multi
features.description: Works with applications written in various programming languages. Universal compatibility

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Optimized for low-latency, high-throughput real-time features. Lightning fast

features.title: Resource Efficient
features.description: Uses significantly less memory than traditional ActionCable. Cost-effective scaling
